MAIN_MESSAGE: We apologise that today's pre arranged work affecting your property in the SY22 postcode area of Llanfyllin is still ongoing. This is due to difficult working conditions on site and we now expect power to be back on by 5.30PM.  We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4PM on 8th November 2020
